pr_title: add missing default property to cdap-defaults.xml

timeline.bodyText: This properties is only temporary until we switch to use the new RuntimeClient, which will be in in a day.
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.message:
default active runtime monitoring to false

This is a temporary fix that will be changed with later commits,
but fixing this now to make distributed runs work in the meantime.

timeline.bodyText:
I think this should be true.
https://github.com/cdapio/cdap/blob/develop/cdap-app-fabric/src/main/java/io/cdap/cdap/internal/app/runtime/distributed/remote/RemoteExecutionJobMain.java#L142
